name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3D新衣装お披露目!! 兎田ぺこら生誕祭ライブ♪【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [jgoJuJiWtf4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Continuation and conclusion of the performance for 'Star-Revelation'.
Usada Pekora performs the song 'Kawaikute Gomen'.
MC segment where Pekora thanks the audience and introduces the upcoming collaboration part.
Performance of 'Positive Star Dance Time' with Inugami Korone.

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 可愛くてごめん
subtitles.english: I'm Sorry for Being So Cute

subtitles.original: 私が私のこと愛して何が悪いの？
subtitles.english: What's wrong with me loving myself?

subtitles.original: 嫉妬でしょうか？
subtitles.english: Is it jealousy?

subtitles.original: 痛いだとか変わってるとか
subtitles.english: Saying it's painful or weird,

subtitles.original: 届きませんね、そのリプライ
subtitles.english: those replies don't reach me.

subtitles.original: 大好きな お洋服
subtitles.english: My favorite clothes,

subtitles.original: 大好きな お化粧で
subtitles.english: my favorite makeup.

subtitles.original: お決まりのハーフツイン巻いて
subtitles.english: The usual half-twins, curled,

subtitles.original: お出かけしよ
subtitles.english: let's go out.

subtitles.original: 日傘持って ぼっちだって
subtitles.english: Bringing a parasol, even if I'm alone,

subtitles.original: 幸せだもん！
subtitles.english: I'm happy!

subtitles.original: Chu! 可愛くてごめん 生まれてきちゃってごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute, sorry for being born.

subtitles.original: Chu! あざとくてごめん 気になっちゃうよね？ごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being manipulative, you're curious, right? Sorry.

subtitles.original: Chu! 可愛くてごめん 努力しちゃっててごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute, sorry for working so hard.

subtitles.original: Chu! 尊くてごめん 女子力高くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so precious, sorry for having high femininity.

subtitles.original: ムカついちゃうよね？ ざまあ
subtitles.english: You're getting annoyed, right? Serves you right.

subtitles.original: あなたはあなたのことだけどうぞ
subtitles.english: You please just mind your own business,

subtitles.original: 私に干渉しないでください
subtitles.english: please don't interfere with me.

subtitles.original: 類は友を呼ぶと言うけど
subtitles.english: They say birds of a feather flock together,

subtitles.original: 届きませんね、その陰口
subtitles.english: but those backbitings don't reach me.

subtitles.original: 重い厚底ブーツ
subtitles.english: Heavy platform boots,

subtitles.original: お気に入りのリュックで
subtitles.english: with my favorite backpack.

subtitles.original: 崩せない前髪 くしでといて
subtitles.english: My unshakeable bangs, combed through,

subtitles.original: お出かけしよ
subtitles.english: let's go out.

subtitles.original: 軽い女？ ふざけんな
subtitles.english: An easy girl? Don't mess with me,

subtitles.original: 重すぎるっつーの！
subtitles.english: I'm way too heavy!

subtitles.original: Chu! 可愛くてごめん この時代生きてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute, sorry for living in this era.

subtitles.original: Chu! 目立っててごめん 意識しちゃうよね？ごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for standing out, you can't help but notice me, right? Sorry.

subtitles.original: Chu! 可愛くてごめん 自分磨きしてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute, sorry for improving myself.

subtitles.original: Chu! ぶりっ子でごめん 虜にしちゃってごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for playing the coquette, sorry for making you captivated.

subtitles.original: ムカついちゃうでしょ？ ざまあ
subtitles.english: You're annoyed, right? Serves you right.

subtitles.original: 趣味の違い 変わり者と
subtitles.english: Differences in hobbies, even if

subtitles.original: 馬鹿にされても
subtitles.english: mocked as an eccentric,

subtitles.original: 負けたくない 怖くもない
subtitles.english: I don't want to lose, I'm not afraid

subtitles.original: あんたらのこと
subtitles.english: of people like you.

subtitles.original: 自分の味方は自分でありたい
subtitles.english: I want to be my own ally,

subtitles.original: 一番大切にしてあげたい
subtitles.english: I want to value myself the most.

subtitles.original: 理不尽な我慢はさせたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to make myself endure unreasonable things,

subtitles.original: それが私
subtitles.english: that is me.

subtitles.original: Chu! 可愛くてごめん 生まれてきちゃってごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute, sorry for being born.

subtitles.original: Chu! あざとくてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being manipulative,

subtitles.original: 人生楽しんでごめん
subtitles.english: sorry for enjoying life.

subtitles.original: Chu! 可愛くてごめん 努力しちゃっててごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute, sorry for working so hard.

subtitles.original: Chu! 尊くてごめん 女子力高くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so precious, sorry for having high femininity.

subtitles.original: ムカついちゃうよね？ ざまあ
subtitles.english: You're getting annoyed, right? Serves you right.

subtitles.original: はい、みんなー！
subtitles.english: Hi, everyone!

subtitles.original: 1曲目は「スターラプレーション」、そして2曲目は「可愛くてごめん」ぺこでしたー！
subtitles.english: The first song was 'Star-Revelation', and the second was 'Kawaikute Gomen'-peko!

subtitles.original: どうぺこか？ どうぺこか？
subtitles.english: How was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: この後はみんなお待ちかねのコラボパートいくぺこ！
subtitles.english: After this, it's time for the long-awaited collaboration part-peko!

subtitles.original: 久しぶりの人や初めて歌う人、お馴染みの人もいるぺこだし...
subtitles.english: There are people I haven't seen in a while, people I'm singing with for the first time, and familiar faces too-peko...

subtitles.original: 後半にはついにあれが...！
subtitles.english: In the latter half, finally that will...!

subtitles.original: てなわけでぺこちゃん準備してくる！ じゃあねー！
subtitles.english: So Peko-chan is going to go get ready! See ya!

subtitles.original: 行くよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: まみむめも モヤモヤだ 君も Are you ready? 準備はいい？
subtitles.english: Ma-mi-mu-me-mo, you're feeling hazy too, Are you ready? Are you prepared?

subtitles.original: スキップ＆ステップ 1, 2, 3, はい！ ポジティブ☆ダンスタイム
subtitles.english: Skip & Step 1, 2, 3, yes! Positive Star Dance Time
